original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 319.00/320.00 to the US dollar, bond yields stable
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 319.75/320.50 to the US dollar on Friday, dealers said.
The rupee closed at 319.75/320.50 to the US dollar on Thursday.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted at stable 12.25/75 percent after closing on Thursday at 12.25/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2028 was quoted stable at 12.60/13.10 percent after closing at 12.60/80 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted up at 12.75/95 percent after closing at 12.60/80 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted stable at 12.75/13.25 percent from closing at 12.75/13.00 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted stable at 13.00/50 percent after closing at 13.00/40 percent. (Colombo/Aug09/2023)
